expression.description: Any JavaScript code inserted here will be evaluated.

command.description: The target command for which help should be displayed.

text.description: Text that will be displayed instead of the factory default 'Pong!'.

ping.example: [According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyways. Because bees don't care what humans think is impossible.]

whois.description: Displays some server-specific data about this user.

user.description: A `@Mention#1234` can be provided to view info for another user.

fetchWiki.description: Fetches data about the queried topic directly from Wikipedia.

topic.description: The topic / area of research that should be fetched.

stream.description: Fetches and plays a video from `YouTube` in audio-format in a Voice Channel.
